constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 53 (Thursday, March 24, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BURGESS:
H.R. 7199.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H3864]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to reinstate pre-pandemic in-office work policies at the Department of the Interior in order to receive certain supplemental emergency relief funds, and for other purposes.
